comments:
I20071106-0816

I have a project with build path errors (The type java.lang.Object cannot be found. It is indirectly referenced from required .class files).

When I now select a type in that project I get this:


!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-11-07 11:34:59.476
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Decoration Calculation".

Bindings.findOverriddenMethodInHierarchy is called recursively on binding.getSuperclass. There should not be any loops there.
